Class SourceManager

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.felix.ipojo.composite.util.SourceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextListener
public class SourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContextListener

This class manages context-source management.

Author:
Felix Project Team

manager - : composite manager
Throws:
ConfigurationException - : the sources are incorrect.

                          org.osgi.framework.BundleContext parent,

                   throws ConfigurationException
Parse the context-source attribute in order to create source tracker object.

Parameters:

global - : global bundle context.
parent - : parent bundle context.
local - : local bundle context.
Throws:
ConfigurationException - : the context-source attribute is invalid.
